channel.title: Monsters of the Midweek

channel.description: Visit our homepage at www.monstersofthemidweek.com - Listen live on Talkshoe to the best weekly preview of the coming weekend's college football games, featuring game picks, weather, keys to the game, and a weekly "Lead Pipe Lock". Join Johnny "the Refrigerator" Crisco, Jim, Donaghy, Larry Bowden, Stormy McMasterson, and Chief Illiniwek each Wednesday evening through the college season. Lee Corso only wishes he had our game! This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com
channel.itunes:author: TheLostBowden
channel.itunes:subtitle: Monsters of the Midweek

channel.itunes:keywords: monsters, midweek, college football, pregame, football, pick em, Lee Corso,

item.title: EPISODE16 - Monsters of the Midweek - Season Finale
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description:
Well the 2007 college football season nears its end and for the Monsters crew, the moment is bittersweet. The recent death of Lil Jim Donaghy hangs heavy on the boys, as they meet to pick the BCS bowls and National Championship matchup. Larry and Johnny will try to keep everyone's spirits up, but the tragic fate of Lil Jim is sure to be visited on this holiday occasion. They say Christmas is the loneliest time, and for the boys, minus one, it truly is.
The post-season vacation beckons and Stormy is promising an adventure cruise to Alaska with his many fans. Details of the cruise package will follow on the website. The Chief's status is in flux. Rumors abound that he has been offered a new mascot job at a major SEC institution. Chief denies it emphatically and has promised TRP that he will return for the 2008 season. As of now, nobody has requested permission to speak with the Chief about any mascot openings, but stay tuned.
item.itunes:author: TheLostBowden
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE16 - Monsters of the Midweek - Season Finale

item.title: EPISODE 15 - Monsters of the Midweek
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Well the regular season is over and now the post-season kicks in. In our first post-season show, the boys will pick the minor bowls, since that's where the Texas teams will be found. We expect Lil Jim back in the saddle, while Larry celebrates his sweep of the CCG picks, as well as his insightful D3 playoff analysis. Johnny will open the show with his recipe for Chocolate Buttered Toffee Twinkies a la mode, while the Chief and Stormy compete for the coveted "Most Ambient Noise" prize. In between all that, we'll pick the four best minor bowls, plus the Holiday Bowl, and talk about the upcoming Heisman trophy presentation. Be sure to join us in our second to last show of the season.
item.itunes:author: TheLostBowden

item.title: EPISODE 14 - Monsters of the Midweek
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: It's conference championship weekend with the boys, as they preview the Big 12, SEC and ACC championship games, along with a couple other key matchups. Lil' Jim has been reported to the National Center for Missing and Exploited Children, having last been seen in the presence of one M. Foley. Numerous text messages have not been returned. Stormy is working on a new book, having debuted in the NY Times Top 20 list. The rest of the crew is preparing for their end of the season vacations. Johnny will be touring the Anheuser Busch brewery in St. Louis, and eating ribs as a day trip. Larry is planning on wintering in Tallahassee, while the Chief will be getting in touch with his roots with a plan to walk across the Bering Strait.
item.itunes:author: TheLostBowden

item.title: EPISODE 13 - Monsters of the Midweek
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: A special Tuesday show in advance of the Thanksgiving holiday. Johnny spends 30 minutes detailing everything he plans to eat on Thursday, while Lil Jim and Larry throw up in their mouths. The Chief is pissed that the Pilgrims get all the credit, and Stormy read his calendar wrong and is drunk on his Christmas eggnog. Plus we pick the best 5 games this holiday weekend.
item.itunes:author: TheLostBowden

item.title: EPISODE 12 - Monsters of the Midweek
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Johnny and Larry answer the age old question. If Mike Leach craps in a forest and nobody steps in it, does it make a smell? Meanwhile Lil Jim is booking tickets to a BCS bowl, any BCS bowl for the Longhorns, the Chief is still pissed off over the upcoming Thanksgiving holiday, but Stormy gave him some special blankets to keep warm.
item.itunes:author: TheLostBowden

item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Join Larry, Lil Jim, the Chief and Stormy for the week's games. Johnny Crisco is currently suspended for demeaning comments made in the last podcast.

item.title: EPISODE 9 - Monsters of the Midweek
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Pure fun and excitement with the Monsters crew. Chief and Stormy get into a debate over how the weather impacted Native Americans during the Indian wars. The other three talk college football.
item.itunes:author: TheLostBowden

item.title: EPISODE 8 - Monsters of the Midweek
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Stormy reveals his secret life as a member of a capella superstars The Monotones, while the Chief does a war dance and casts an evil spell on Lee Corso. Johnny and Lil Jim continue to flirt with each other, while Larry announces his intention to return to college coaching.
item.itunes:author: TheLostBowden

item.title: EPISODE 7 - Monsters of the Midweek
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Johnny and Larry promise not to gay it up any more than they did last week, while the Chief and Stormy debate whether Bud Light or Funnelcakes makes the most quenching drink at the Red River Rivalry. Lil Jim has come out of his coma, but The Chupacabra still holds out hope for a return engagement.

item.title: EPISODE6 - Monsters of the Midweek
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Our October Top 10 rankings are out. Crisco is sizzling with his picks, while Bowden is stinking like an Indian on the 4th week of the Trail of Tears. Lil Jim is in the hospital, Stormy is drunk, and the Chief is just plain pissed off. Plus, we'll pick some games.
item.itunes:author: TheLostBowden

item.title: EPISODE 5 - Monsters of the Midweek
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Johnny Crisco gloats about his second straight win in the pick 'em while Lil Jim deals with life on the bottom. We'll pick five more games and word on the street is that the Chief is planning to scalp the first person who talks back to him.
item.itunes:author: TheLostBowden

item.title: EPISODE 4 - Monsters of the Midweek
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: The Monsters are back to grieve their poor performance picking last week's games. Larry Bowden reveals the secret behind Notre Dame's downfall. The Chief calls in with a new tin can and string, and Lil Jim does the entire podcast sitting on two phone books. Stormy re-appears and makes his formal apology.
item.itunes:author: TheLostBowden

item.description: The Monsters review their first week picks and bring you the top 5 games of the next weekend. Tune in to see if Lil Jim escapes indictment and if Stormy goes postal on the crew.
